AppSettings.pubEndpoint: secret - add secret with dotnet user-secrets set "AppSettings:PubEndpoint" "Endpoint=sb..."
AppSettings.subEndpoint: secret - add secret with dotnet user-secrets set "AppSettings:SubEndpoint" "Endpoint=sb..."
AppSettings.subName: secret - add secret with dotnet user-secrets set "AppSettings:SubName" "value"
AppSettings.topicName: secret - add secret with dotnet user-secrets set "AppSettings:TopicName" "value"
